text: <@U22PKFRU5> curious what are your thoughts on this. Thanks man!

Can we save the submitted HubSpot form data into HUBDB table ?
If yes could you please give some idea with an example ?
Louis - Technically you can use this a headless with public APIs.. Do u see anything missing?

Hi Mohesh, you can: using the Formdata API and zapier, relatively easy, but form data typically includes personal data that should be protected (GDPR) .  connect zapier account with HubSpot, trigger is formdata API , using
<@U9MAWTESW> two years later...any chance this example is still online? Myself and another employee at Hubs wanted to check out how this looked live and found this thread...

Has anyone worked with <http://Blendr.io|Blendr.io> + HS integration to enable/automate Google Sheets > HubDB - Update Tables? Or know of another solution to auto-sync cloud hosted csv files to HubDB Table. Thx!
